text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 64. Should any bhikkhu knowingly conceal (another) bhikkhu's serious offense, it is to be confessed.
๖๔. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด รู้อยู่ ปิดอาบัติชั่ว หยาบของภิกษุ เป็นปาจิตตีย์
64. Should any bhikkhu knowingly conceal a bhikkhu's gross fault (i.e. Defeat or one entailing Initial and Subsequent Meeting of the Sangha), it entails expiation.
